85972.name: Index of Democracy (How Was Life, OECD (2014))
85972.description:
The Index of Democracy, by Vanhanen, is the product of the participation and the competition indices, divided by 100. Specifically: Index = [(% of the adult population who voted in the elections) * (1 - % of the winning party's votes in a national election)] / 100

Its value is between 0 and 100, with 100 being the maximum theoretically possible level of democracy.
85972.datasetName: Political Competition and Participation (How Was Life, OECD (2014))
